TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DataObjectAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DataObjectAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DataObjectAttribute sealed : Attribute

Docs.summary: Identifies a type as an object suitable for binding to an object. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to identify an object as suitable for use by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object. Design-time classes such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to present suitable objects to bind to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md).
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how you can apply the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> attribute to indicate an object is suitable for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object. In this example, the `NorthwindData` object is intended for use with an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
[!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/CS/dataobjectmethodattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/VB/dataobjectmethodattribute.vb#3)]

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to `true` when you use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor> constructor.
[!code-csharp[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/CS/dataobjectmethodattribute.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.ComponentModel.DataObjectMethodAttribute/VB/dataobjectmethodattribute.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(bool isDataObject) cil managed

Docs.param: if the object is suitable for binding to an object; otherwise, .
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class and indicates whether an object is suitable for binding to an object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Use the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%28System.Boolean%29> constructor to indicate to a design-time class such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDesigner> class that an object should be excluded from the list of suitable objects for binding to an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> object.
The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property is set to the value of the `isDataObject` parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute DataObject
Public Shared ReadOnly DataObject As DataObjectAttribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.DataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute Default
Public Shared ReadOnly Default As DataObjectAttribute

Docs.summary: Represents the default value of the class, which indicates that the class is suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.Default> field defines an instance of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> class initialized with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.%23ctor%2A> constructor, which sets the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property to `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute NonDataObject
Public Shared ReadOnly NonDataObject As DataObjectAttribute

Docs.summary: Indicates that the class is not suitable for binding to an object at design time. This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.NonDataObject> field returns a new <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute> object with the <xref:System.ComponentModel.DataObjectAttribute.IsDataObject%2A> property set to `false`.
